creator.name: Ahmed Mohamed Attia
creator.title: Website Creator | Electronics & Communications Engineering Student
creator.bio: Student at the Faculty of Engineering, Electronics & Communications Department, Zagazig University. Passionate about Integrated Circuit (IC) Design and Digital Systems.
creator.role: Ideator and Developer of "Compass" (Bawsala). The goal was to organize scattered information in the field and present it as a clear, simplified roadmap to help every student start their journey without distraction.

mainContributor.name: Eng. Yousef Sherif
mainContributor.title: Owner of the Main Content Drive
mainContributor.bio: Verification Engineer at ICpedia (Synopsys Contractor) and former TA at AUC. Yousef is considered the primary source of the rich scientific content upon which this website is built.
mainContributor.role: Yousef put tremendous effort into compiling, reviewing, and organizing the "Comprehensive Guide to Digital IC Design" and its attachments. This website acts as an organized interactive interface for this valuable content.

contributors.name: Eng. Ziad Mohammed
contributors.title: Data Organization & Content Structuring Contributor
contributors.bio: Electrical Engineering Student interested in digital systems and data organization. He contributed significantly to coordinating content and preparing the internal data for Compass, ensuring a professional and organized output.
contributors.role: Ziad played a pivotal role in arranging, formatting, and cleaning the data used to build the website pages. He worked on structuring the data for various sections to appear consistent and user-friendly, helping transform raw content into a clear and organized learning experience.

contributors.name: Eng. Yaseen Salah
contributors.title: Content Contributor
contributors.role: Provided valuable feedback and helped provide important resources to enrich the guide.

contributors.name: Eng. Fatma Ali
contributors.title: Content Contributor
contributors.role: Provided valuable tips and specialized resources in MATLAB and Verification.

contributors.name: Eng. Moumen Sameh
contributors.title: Content Contributor
contributors.role: Shared his valuable graduation project experience and offered practical advice to students.

experts.name: Dr. Diaa Khalil

experts.bio: Professor specializing in Integrated Circuit Design.
experts.role: Essential source for valuable lectures in VLSI.

experts.name: Dr. Hisham Omran
experts.title: Professor & Expert
experts.bio: Professor specializing in Digital Integrated Circuit Design.
experts.role: Main source for advanced Digital IC Design courses.

experts.role: Important source for Logic Design and Digital Verification courses.

experts.role: Source for Advanced Computer Architecture courses.

experts.title: Engineer & Expert
experts.role: Provided important guidance and directions in the field (Digital Design Guidance).
